title: Cross-Disciplinary Collaboration Project for Mobile App Design and English Learning Integration: Text-Lexis-Expression-Centered Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Basic smartphone usage skills, beginner-level English (foundational grammar/vocabulary/reading comprehension), digital content creation experience
context.additional_context: Collaborative mobile app design and English learning content creation using only smartphones. Focuses on improving learnersâ€™ writing, reading, and expressive skills during the project process, with the goal of developing content applicable in real educational settings.

learning_goals: Learners will develop a prototype English learning app using mobile app design tools and cultivate the ability to optimize text structure and vocabulary usage.
Learners will collaborate with English education experts to design an app that incorporates feedback for improving grammar, reading comprehension, and expressive skills.
Learners analyze mobile app cases encountered in daily life to propose interdisciplinary problem-solving approaches and apply them to English learning contexts.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
